Tor @ 30th Chaos Communication Congress, Hamburg, Germany

27 Dec 2013

Several members of the Tor project will attend the 30th Chaos Communication Congress (30C3), an annual four-day conference on technology, society and utopia.

Roger Dingledine and Jacob Appelbaum will do a lecture on contemporary Tor Network issues related to censorship, security, privacy and anonymity online on 2013-12-27 20:30.
